formErrorMessage: We couldn't find your name on the guest list, please check that you have written it correctly.
formQuestion: <bold>{{name}}</bold>! Although there are many details missing, we want to know if you will attend our wedding.
messageDate: On March 21st, we'll mark the day our <bold>yes</bold> becomes a <bold>forever.</bold>

name: Name

confirmMessage: We are so excited to have you as part of our special day!
declineMessage: We will miss you, but if you still want to participate virtually, we will share a link where the ceremony will be broadcasted
